      • searchData

        public static java.util.List<byte[]> searchData(java.lang.String tableName,
                                long startRowkey,
                                long endRowkey,
                                java.lang.String url)
        Query, enter the range of rowkey and table name, function to return to the range of all rowkey
        参数:
        tableName: - Relational database table name
        startRowkey: - Start time
        endRowkey: - End time
        url: - Big data platform address
        返回:

      • importRdbTable2Hbase

        public static java.lang.String importRdbTable2Hbase(java.lang.String dbType,
                                    java.lang.String dbName,
                                    java.lang.String connectionUrl,
                                    java.lang.String userName,
                                    java.lang.String password,
                                    java.lang.String tableName,
                                    java.lang.String url)
        According to the data source and tableName, import table data to HBase
        参数:
        dbType: - Relational database type
        dbName: - Relational database name
        connectionUrl: - Relational database IP
        userName: - Relational database user name
        password: - Relational database password
        tableName: - Relational database table name
        url: - Big data platform address
        返回:
        Hbase table name and HBase import only ID combination

      • hbaseImportDetail

        public static java.lang.String hbaseImportDetail(java.lang.String dbType,
                                 java.lang.String connectionUrl,
                                 java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 java.lang.String dbName,
                                 java.lang.String rdbcolumns,
                                 java.lang.String linenum,
                                 java.lang.String tableName,
                                 java.lang.String rowkeyparam,
                                 java.lang.String partitioncolumn,
                                 java.lang.String rdbtablename,
                                 java.lang.String familys,
                                 java.lang.String hbasecolumns,
                                 java.lang.String port,
                                 java.lang.String url)
        Import data from famliy to HBase
        参数:
        dbType:Relational - DataBase Type
        connectionUrl:Relational - DataBase IP
        userName: - Relational database user name
        password: - Relational database password
        dbName:Relational - database name
        rdbcolumns:Relational - database tableName Fileds
        linenum:Relational - database table datas lines
        tableName:Relational - database tableName
        rowkeyparam:rowkey -
        partitioncolumn:Primary - key
        rdbtablename:Relational - database tableName
        familyParms:family - Object
        port:DataBase - port
        url: - Big data platform address
        返回:

      • searchProgress

        public static java.lang.String searchProgress(java.lang.String mrOnekey,
                              java.lang.String url)
        Monitor data import
        参数:
        mrOnekey:HBase - import only ID, generated by calling importRdbTable2Hbase
        url: - Big data platform address
        返回:
        HBase import Progress And Time

      • update

        public static void update(java.lang.String tableName,

          java.lang.String line,
          java.lang.String rowkey,
          java.lang.String url)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        update data from HBase
        参数:
        tableName: - Relational database table name
        colnames: - Column and famlily combination
        line: - Column value
        rowkey: - Your appointed hbase rowkey
        url: - Big data platform address
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
